newsitem.title: ANGOLA: More than 160 prisoners escape from Angola jail.
newsitem.headline: More than 160 prisoners escape from Angola jail.

text.p: More than 160 prisoners escaped from a Luanda jail on the outskirts of the capital at the weekend, Angolan state radio said.
A guard at the Luanda Central jail told the radio on Tuesday a total of 169 prisoners had escaped on Saturday, many of them hardened criminals.
The guard, speaking on condition of anonymity, told the radio the jailbreak was due to a breach in security.
"Obviously something went wrong with our security on Saturday and you can't rule out complacency on the part of the guards," the guard told the radio.
He said no one was killed or injured during the escape.
